1.text: In which sector of activity is your company active?
options: Specialized, Scientific and Technical or Administrative and Support Services Activities

2.text: What is the number of employees in your company on 18/12/31 ?

3.text: What is the turnover of your company in the last fiscal year? (or annual budget for Public sector)

4.text: Do you develop digital services for internal or external use (sales to customers)?

5.text: What is the number of users of your digital services?

sub_questions: Do you apply the rules and best practices for digital accessibility?
Have you optimized the states and printouts in your application tools (reduced number of pages when printing, ink consumption ...)
Do you integrate the principles of the ecodesign of digital services?
Do you use a modular application architecture?
Do you do a design review at the end of your application's development?

11.text: What is the overall storage volume of your corporate data (centralized on external hard drives, centralized server, NAS, SAN ...) in Terabytes (TB) useful?
options: I do not want to answer

12.text: Do you have a server or do you only work with one or more workstations?
options: We work with workstation (s), without centralized physical server
We have (at least) a centralized physical server

13.text: Do you have a dedicated room, simple room or cupboard with bay dedicated to your IT infrastructure?
options: A closet or a room without any specific system

14.text: Is your computer room in house or at a host?
options: Host Member of the European Code of Conduct for Datacenters
Non-adhering Host of the European Code of Conduct for Data Centers

15.text: What is the total area of your computer rooms (excluding technical infrastructure *)? (in m2)
options: I do not want to answer

16.text: Do you know the PUE * of your Data Center?/n*PUE : Power Usage Effectiveness

17.text:
What is the rate of charge or energy use of your computer rooms?
Rate = Electrical power absorbed by your IT equipment, divided by room capacity in kW, then multiplied by 100 (used energy / available energy)

18.text: Have you led or are you planning actions to optimize your infrastructure? Especially :
sub_questions: The purchase of non-IT equipment from IT rooms (air conditioning, air treatment, inverters, etc.) according to energy efficiency criteria
Implementing the good practices of the 'European Code of Conduct for DataCenter'?
Regular monitoring of environmental indicators of computer rooms
Environmental impact analysis of the datacenter in life cycle approach
Optimizing the architecture and layout of rooms
The urbanization of halls in hot / cold aisles
The use of natural cooling sources (freecooling)
Implementation of a heat recovery system for computer rooms (heating)
The set temperature in the cold corridor remains higher than 24 °
The choice of a modular datacenter architecture

31.text: Have you led or are you planning actions to optimize your infrastructure? Especially :
sub_questions: The correct sizing of the servers in relation to their use
Give priority to ASHRAE 2 compatible equipment
A procedure for provisioning and de-provisioning data-processing equipment in datacenters

39.text: Do you know the number of physical servers and virtual servers in your company?
options: I do not want to answer

40.text: How many physical servers do you have?

41.text: How many virtual servers do you have?

42.text: What will be the evolution of your number of physical servers for 2019? (in % or quantity)
options: I want to answer (Please answer in % or quantity)
I do not want to answer

43.text: What will be the evolution of your number of virtual servers for 2019?
options: I want to answer (Please answer in % or quantity)
I do not want to answer

44.text: Has your company appointed a Green IT Manager / Digital Manager?

45.text: Do you have a responsible digital strategy broken down into an action plan?

46.text: Is Green IT a topic integrated into your CSR strategy?

47.text: Do you regularly evaluate the environmental impacts of your information system?
options: Yes partially, including only equipment present in the company
Yes totally, including our internal equipment and services hosted by third parties

48.text: Do you have a team of competent referees on the topics of Green IT?

49.text: Have you integrated Green IT into your business strategy

50.text: Do you have those equipments in your compagny:
sub_questions: Small printers (<15kg, potentially used by a household)
Other flat screens (TV, projection screen, digital board ...)
Fixed telephones (standalone not connected to such a standard)

62.text: Do you have other devices in your company?

63.text: Do you have those equipments in your compagny:

70.text: Do you know the consumption of your workstation in kWh per year?
options: Yes (please specify how much in kWh / year)

71.text: Do you track the energy consumption of your compagny activities?

72.text: Do you know the share of IT and IT equipment in your company's total energy consumption?

73.text: Have you set up a power management system? (automatic shutdown / shutdown of workstations)

74.text: Do you use copiers from a repackaging industry (second-hand / second-hand)?

75.text: Do you consolidate individual printers to shared printers?

76.text: Have you set up an identification system on printers (to trigger printing)?

77.text: What is the average life of your professional copier / MFP *?

78.text: Are your printers set by default in eco mode? Especially:

83.text: What is the number of pages printed / day / employee? (A4 equivalent)

84.text: Can you specify the number of cartridges / toners:
options: Cartridges stored in the average business
Toners stored in the average business

85.text: Do you organize the separate collection of waste cartridges / toners?
options: No, no separate collection device is planned

86.text: Do you prefer the use of recycled paper?
options: Yes, our paper is made from virgin paste

88.text: Do you organize the separate collection of waste paper for recycling?
